assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: KEI Industries Limited manufactures and supplies wires and cables in India and internationally. It operates through Cables; Engineering, Procurement and Construction; and Stainless Steel Wire segments. The company offers extra high voltage cables; high and low voltage cables; high tension and low tension cables; control and instrumentation cables; specialty cables; flexible and house wires; submersible cables; marine and offshore cables; solar and rubber cables; thermocouple extension/compensating cables; fire survival/resistant cables; PVC/poly wrapped winding wires; stainless steel wires comprising welding, hard and fine stainless steel, cold heading, and general purpose wires; and winding wires. In addition, the company offers engineering, procurement, and construction services; and project management services. It exports its products to approximately 45 countries. The company's products are used in power, oil refineries, railways, automobiles, cement, steel, fertilizers, textile, and real estate sectors. KEI Industries Limited was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.
